TopicTitle: "Launch a new vessel" contract keeps re-appearing

Articles.Content: As the title says, the beginner contract "launch a new vessel" keeps popping up in my available contracts in Career Mode. The blurb says it is to mark the start of the space program. Am I doing such a bad job the Kerbals think I haven't even started yet?

Huh. Well this sounds like a bug of some sort, but we definitely need more details about what you're doing.

If you could have a look at this thread, it would help if you could provide some extra info.

Cheers,

~Claw
